info.task: navigate to previous tab in tab list
info.title: Navigate to the previous tab in a tab list in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondTab
setupScript.description: sets focus on the second tab
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the second tab
testPageDocument.querySelector('#agnes').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Agnes Obel' tab, navigate to the previous tab.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Agnes Obel' tab, navigate to the previous tab.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: State of the tab, 'selected', is conveyed
Position of tab in the tab list, 1, is conveyed
Number of tabs in the tab list, 3, is conveyed
